dublin_core.dcvalue: Pulmonary vein PV ablation is a treatment option for patients with atrial fibrillation AF The efficacy of treatment is often assessed by the evaluation of symptoms However a high proportion of AF episodes occur in the absence of symptoms as observed in pharmacological treated patients The purpose of this study was to assess the association of symptoms and AF in patients who underwent PV ablation for the treatment of paroxysmal AF
European journal of cardiovascular nursing : journal of the Working Group on Cardiovascular Nursing of the European Society of Cardiology
Symptoms versus objective rhythm monitoring in patients with paroxysmal atrial fibrillation undergoing pulmonary vein isolation.
